basics.name: JR Lee
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Hi! I am currently a Computer Science student at the University of Hawaii at Manoa with a passion for data science and languages.

work.summary: Analyzed and visualized Census Bureau data to drive decisions on resource allocation to resolve inequities in the community
highlights: Presented findings of Census Bureau analysis to Council Member Weyer
Developed a data pipeline using Census Bureau APIs and PostreSQL databases

work.summary: Translated and proofread material from Chinese to English for a mobile game.
highlights: Optimized workflow by developing Python scripts and Google Sheets formulae to automatically translate and proofread certain repetitive content

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
